## Web3sdkioProvider variable

> This feature is currently in beta and may change based on feedback that we receive.

Gives access to the Web3sdkioSDK instance and other useful hooks to the rest of the app. Requires to be wrapped with a ConnectionProvider and a WalletProvider from @solana/wallet-adapter-react.

## Example

```tsx
import { Web3sdkioProvider } from "@web3sdkio/react/solana";

const App = () => {
  return (
    <Web3sdkioProvider network="devnet">
      <YourApp />
    </Web3sdkioProvider>
  );
};
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
Web3sdkioProvider: React.FC<PropsWithChildren<Web3sdkioProviderProps>>;
```
